title: Achieving Advanced Learning Outcomes through Project-Based Biology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Differentiated learning support considering spatial intelligence levels and collaborative environments using digital tools

learning_goals: Students can design and execute collaborative projects using the PBL (Project-Based Learning) model to solve biology problems
Learners can analyze structural relationships of biological phenomena using spatial intelligence and represent them visually
Over 85% of learners achieve a grade of B or higher in project-based assessments by the end of the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
